story.title: Sacred Geometry in Three Dimensions
paragraphs: Borobudur is not merely a temple—it's a three-dimensional mandala, a cosmic diagram that guides pilgrims from earthly desire to enlightenment. Built in the 9th century, its nine stacked platforms represent the Buddhist cosmology's layers of existence.

Our miniature preserves the monument's sacred mathematics: six square platforms crowned by three circular ones, culminating in a central stupa that reaches toward the sky. Each of the 72 perforated stupas contains a Buddha statue, visible through diamond-shaped openings.

We've captured every relief panel's placement, every stairway's alignment with cardinal directions, and the subtle tapering that creates the illusion of infinite height. This is architecture as spiritual technology.

items.question: What makes Borobudur's design unique?
items.answer: Borobudur is the world's largest Buddhist temple and features a unique three-dimensional mandala design with nine stacked platforms - six square and three circular, topped with a central dome. Our miniature faithfully recreates this sacred geometry at 1:200 scale with all 72 stupas precisely positioned.

items.question: How long will it take to receive my order?
items.answer: Production takes 7-10 business days as each piece is made to order with hand-finishing. After production, standard shipping takes 5-7 days (express 2-3 days). We provide tracking information and updates throughout the process.

items.question: Can I choose different sizes or finishes?
items.answer: Yes! We offer Standard (15cm), Large (25cm), and Premium (35cm) sizes. Finish options include Matte Black (standard), Sandstone Texture, and White Marble Effect. Custom requests are also welcome - just contact us!

items.question: Is this made from eco-friendly materials?
items.answer: Absolutely. We use eco-friendly UV-resistant photopolymer resin that's safe for indoor display. Our production process minimizes waste, and all materials are carefully selected for both quality and environmental responsibility.

items.question: How should I display and care for this miniature?
items.answer: Display on a stable surface away from direct sunlight. To clean, simply dust with a soft, dry cloth. Handle by the base to protect the delicate stupas. With minimal care, your Borobudur miniature will last for generations.

items.question: Do you ship internationally?
items.answer: Yes! We ship worldwide with premium protective packaging to ensure your miniature arrives safely. Shipping costs and times vary by location. Free shipping is available on orders over ₹5,000 within India.
